entry.title: Block Size Increase
entry.summary: The email context shares a link to an article discussing the potential consequences of running out of capacity in Bitcoin. The author notes that a hard-coded 20MB limit could create larger blockages in the future, and it may be harder to change the block limit again. The writer then suggests going to eat dinner, leaving readers to consider the implications of such changes to the Bitcoin network. Lastly, the email includes a promotional message for a server and application dashboard with performance metrics and transaction tracing capabilities.
